publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1143 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Human Rights in Myanmar-That the Parliament expresses its opposition to the continuing restrictions in movement imposed on Myanmar opposition leader, Nobel laureate Aung San Suu Kyi; calls upon the Myanmar military regime to open a dialogue with the National League for Democratic Forces and national minorities and demands full restoration of democracy, human and political rights in Myanmar. Supported by: Mr John Swinney*, Tricia Marwick*, Michael Matheson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-1143 Human Rights in Myanmar (lodged on 1 September 2000) Donald Gorrie*, Linda Fabiani*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-1143 Human Rights in Myanmar (lodged on 1 September 2000) Alex Neil*, Richard Lochhead*
S1M-1143 Human Rights in Myanmar (lodged on 1 September 2000) Shona Robison*

S1M-1143 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Human Rights in Myanmar-That the Parliament expresses its opposition to the continuing restrictions in movement imposed on Myanmar opposition leader, Nobel laureate Aung San Suu Kyi; calls upon the Myanmar military regime to open a dialogue with the National League for Democratic Forces and national minorities and demands full restoration of democracy, human and political rights in Myanmar. Supported by: Mr John Swinney, Tricia Marwick, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Bruce Crawford, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Donald Gorrie, Linda Fabiani, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Fiona McLeod*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1143 Human Rights in Myanmar (lodged on 1 September 2000) Andrew Wilson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Fiona Hyslop*, Colin Campbell*, Michael Russell*
S1M-1143 Human Rights in Myanmar (lodged on 1 September 2000) Robert Brown*

S1M-1143 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Human Rights in Myanmar-That the Parliament expresses its opposition to the continuing restrictions in movement imposed on Myanmar opposition leader, Nobel laureate Aung San Suu Kyi; calls upon the Myanmar military regime to open a dialogue with the National League for Democratic Forces and national minorities and demands full restoration of democracy, human and political rights in Myanmar. Supported by: Mr John Swinney, Tricia Marwick, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Bruce Crawford, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Donald Gorrie, Linda Fabiani, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Fiona McLeod, Ms Sandra White, Andrew Wilson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fiona Hyslop, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Robert Brown, Ms Margo MacDonald*

Supported by: Mr John Swinney, Tricia Marwick, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Bruce Crawford, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Donald Gorrie, Linda Fabiani, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Fiona McLeod, Ms Sandra White, Andrew Wilson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fiona Hyslop, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Robert Brown, Ms Margo MacDonald
